articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Sunday sent a message of greetings to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.  
					 The message said:
					
					 Extending greetings to the Russian people on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation, I hope that the relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation will develop in the spirit of joint documents agreed between the two sides.

articles.title: Russian President Greets Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian President Greets Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday received a message of greetings from D. Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation.
					 The message said:
					
					 Esteemed Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 I congratulate you on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation, national holiday of the Korean people.
					
					 It is my belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and mutual respect between the two peoples that have been forged and strengthened in the historic course of joint struggle to liberate Korea from the colonial yoke of foreign forces would develop, boosting security and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia as a whole.
					
					 Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 Please accept my best wishes for your success and happiness and the DPRK people's peace and prosperity.
					
					 Respectfully Yours.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia would develop in keeping with the interests and desire of the two peoples, Kim in the message wished the Russian president success in his work for the socio-economic progress of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Russian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Russian PM
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, prime minister of the Russian government, on Sunday, the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Expressing belief that the DPRK-Russia bilateral cooperative relations would develop in the spirit of joint documents agreed between the two countries, the message wished the prime minister success in his work.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a message of greetings to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President 
					Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people of all strata, school youth and children and overseas Koreans visited the statue of Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen before the statue was a floral basket from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Placed before the statue were floral baskets in the name of the Party, armed forces and power organs, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and organs, enterprises, factories and schools at all levels in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 A floral basket was also laid in the name of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Calling back with deep emotion upon the exploits of national liberation performed by peerless patriot and legendary hero Kim Il Sung, the participants paid tribute to him in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid before his statues at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of People's Security, the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace and various other places.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth children in other parts of the DPRK, too, laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of Kim Il Sung in their residential quarters.
					
					 The delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin who is chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee laid a floral basket before the statue of the President on Mansu Hill on the same day.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Sunday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They paid high tribute to the statue of the President with strong yearning and boundless reverence for him who led the anti-Japanese war to a victory to liberate the country and built a socialist power on this land.
					
					 They made bows in profound reverence to the President who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country, the freedom and happiness of the people and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 Foreigners also visited the palace on the same day to pay homage to the President. They include the Chinese youth friendship delegation led by Zhou Zhangkui, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, the delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Seiichi Sakugawa, president of the National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea, and the delegation of the Japanese Youth Society for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Nobuaki Endo. 
					
					 They made entries in the visitors' book.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries and Towers
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries and Towers
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin who is chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Sunday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The wreath was laid in the name of the delegation.
					
					 The guests observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 Then they laid bunches of flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, and paid tribute to her.
					
					 The delegation and staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on the same day.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were members of the delegation, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation and staff members of the embassy laid wreaths and bunches of flowers before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Earlier, staff members of the embassy laid bunches of flowers before the liberation tower, monument to and cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Haeju, Wonsan and Hungnam.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin who is chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee arrived here Sunday to visit the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The delegation was met at the airport by O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, officials concerned, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin who is chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.
					 The head of the delegation said that he would make efforts to boost the economic cooperation between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, officials concerned, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK and his staff members.

articles.title: Gift from Head of Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Head of Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin, chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee, who is heading the delegation of the Russian Federation on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The gift was hand over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Viktor Basargin on Sunday.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Russian Federation headed by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin who is chairman of the Russian side of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee flew back Sunday after visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Earlier the delegation visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The government of the DPRK arranged a reception for the delegation on the day.

articles.title: Appeal Calls for National Reunification
articles.content:
Appeal Calls for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Sunday made public an appeal to all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Korean Peninsula still remains divided into two, beset with the danger of war, though 65 years have passed since its liberation, the appeal noted, and went on:
					
					 A key to solving it lies in implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as they are declarations for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Military tensions and danger of war are escalating on this land day by day and this will bring the nation nothing but disaster.
					
					 Calling for resolutely smashing all the hostile acts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers keen on war and confrontation and boosting solidarity and unity among the people of all strata in the north and the south through visits and contacts, the appeal continued:
					
					 This year marks the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" and the 105th anniversary of the fabrication of the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty".
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad should wrest apology and reparation for the criminal acts Japan committed against the Korean nation through history.
					
					 The spirit of sovereignty and independence displayed by martyrs in their struggle against the Japanese imperialists is still alive in the hearts of the Koreans.
					
					 Let us put an end to national division and achieve the independent reunification without fail, carrying forward the intention of the patriotic forerunners who laid down their lives without hesitation to retake the homeland from the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Let us rally close under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Joint Concert of Korean and Russian Artistes Given
articles.content:
Joint Concert of Korean and Russian Artistes Given
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A joint concert of the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and a group of famous Russian artistes was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Sunday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Appreciating the concert were senior army and state officials, officials of armed forces organ, ministries and national institutions, creators in the fields of culture and arts, artistes, teachers and students.
					
					 Among the audience were members of the delegation of the Russian Federation now on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation, the Russian ambassador to the DPRK and staff members his embassy.     
					
					 Put on the stage were Korean songs including chorus "Song of General Kim Il Sung," an immortal revolutionary paean, mixed duet "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae" and female chorus "Girl on a Galloping Steed". Performers presented Russian songs and world music including tenor solo "Looking up to Sky" and soprano solo "Million Roses." 
					
					Famous conductors, instrumentalists and vocalists of the two countries highly praised the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by accomplishing the historic cause of Korea's liberation and opening up a new history of prosperity on this land and immortal exploits General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il has performed by glorifying the dignity of the country and the nation with his unique idea and leadership.
					
					 Also staged were the numbers representing the Russian people's feelings and emotion with merry and emotional melodies.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience for its rich ideological contents and high artistry.

articles.title: Simultaneous Masses Held
articles.content:
Simultaneous Masses Held
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- August 15 masses of Buddhists in the north and the south were simultaneously held at temples across the northern half of Korea on Sunday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of national liberation.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, resident priests, monks and believers at temples.
					
					 Buddhist rituals were held at the masses. Then followed speeches and a joint address of Buddhists in the north and the south praying for national reunification.
					
					 Speeches and address said that the simultaneous masses at all temples in the north and the south on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of national liberation are significant events reflecting the desire and will of all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad for reunification. They called upon all the Buddhists in the north and the south to more dynamically turn out in the present drive to resolutely shatter the reckless anti-DPRK nuclear war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, improve the inter-Korean relations and defend and implement the north-south declarations in Dharma-minded concord under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Kim Il Sung's Korea
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Kim Il Sung's Korea
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Sunday editorially mark the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation
					 August 15 when President Kim Il Sung liberated the country by leading the arduous anti-Japanese war to a victory is a historic day that marked an epoch for the rebirth of the Korean nation and the advent of socialist Korea, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The President liberated the country, thereby putting an end to the history of the nation's distress and making it possible for the Korean people to lead a worthwhile life and exercise their rights and for the DPRK to emerge a full-fledged independent and sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK could set an epoch-making example in the revolution and construction and turn into a socialist power from the scratch thanks to the wise guidance of the President who hewed out the original road of socialism and led it to a shining victory while covering a rigorous untrodden path of the revolution.
					
					 He glorified Korean-style socialism while resolutely shattering flunkeyism, dogmatism and national nihilism under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea during the days of the arduous struggle to build a new country, defend it and build socialism.
					
					 Under his leadership the cause of building the party, the army and the country was achieved in the DPRK with the fighters trained in the anti-Japanese armed struggle as the backbone and the firm foundation of socialism laid with the army as pillars and the invincible national power built with the military muscle as hard core.
					
					 The powerful military muscle symbolizes the dignity of the DPRK and provides a reliable guarantee for the triumphant advance of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The DPRK is Kim Il Sung's Korea which is shedding its rays generation after generation as it is holding General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem. 
					
					 It is demonstrating its dignity as an invincible socialist power the eternal prosperity of which is fully guaranteed under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Minju Joson calls for eternally valuing and further glorifying the socialist gains and all the assets of the country, legacies bequeathed by the President.

articles.title: KPA Warning on US-S. Korea War Maneuvers
articles.content:
KPA Warning on US-S. Korea War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army Sunday released a statement in connection with the fact that the provocative joint naval exercises staged by the U.S. imperialist warmongers and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in the East and West Seas of Korea is to be led to all-out war maneuvers codenamed Ulji Freedom Guardian to be launched from August 16 to 26.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Huge armed forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops including nuclear strike means had already been deployed in south Korea and its surrounding waters and operation groups of the three services are placed on alert in the central Pacific line and the U.S. mainland ready to be hurled into the Korean front in case of contingency.
					
					 Involved in the maneuvers will be not only active-duty personnel and reserve forces of the south Korean puppet group but local puppet administrative organs and civilian enterprises.
					
					 The "Cheonan" sinking case was the first phase of the reckless anti-DPRK military provocations based on unprecedented fabrication and smear campaign while the war maneuvers including the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint exercises represent the phase of practical actions aimed at a full-dressed military invasion.
					
					 This is because the projected war maneuvers under the spurious signboard of "defense" are belligerent and undisguised DPRK-targeted war exercises.
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to prove that the said exercises are an all-out war maneuvers against the DPRK, the largest-ever nuclear war maneuvers undeniable in light of the scale of means and forces, contents and nature of the exercises.
					
					 The reality indicates that the plan for building "a world without nuclear weapons" and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula much touted by the Obama Administration are nothing but hypocrisy and reveals the treacherous and anti-reunification hideous crimes of the Lee Myung Bak group of sycophants and quislings toeing the U.S. line.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never be taken aback by the reckless war provocations of the bellicose forces.
					
					 Now that the reckless war maneuvers targeted against the DPRK have reached the limit, the army and people of the DPRK will deal a merciless counterblow to the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors as it had already resolved and declared at home and abroad.
					
					 The military counteraction of the DPRK will be the severest punishment no one has ever met in the world.
					
					 The Obama Administration would be well advised to cool its head heated with the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and deeply ponder over what the DPRK meant when it clarified its resolute determination and solemn declaration to defend the country and the nation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors engrossed in sycophancy and submission will clearly understand sooner or later what miserable fate it will meet as sycophant and quisling.
					
					 The more recklessly the warmongers persist in the war rackets as a result of wrong policy option, the faster and deeper they will fall into the grave of self-destruction.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Rwandan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Rwandan President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Paul Kagame upon his reelection as president of Rwanda.
					 Kim in the message extended warm congratulations to Paul upon his reassumption of an important post as president of Rwanda after winning great trust and support from the people at the presidential election held in the country some time ago.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too, the message wished the president greater successes in his future work.

articles.title: Yun Ki Jong Dies
articles.content:
Yun Ki Jong Dies
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Yun Ki Jong, alternate member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and honorary professor at Kim Il Sung University, died of acute cardiac insufficiency at 09:30, Friday at the age of 81.
					 She was subject to the fate of stateless slave after being born during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. After the liberation of the country she grew up to be a competent woman official under the warm care of President Kim Il Sung and devotedly worked for the Party and the revolution.
					
					 While working at the responsible posts of state economic organs and educational institutions for a long period, she devoted all her wisdom and enthusiasm to pushing forward socialist economic construction and developing the education of the rising generations.
					
					 She received many state citations including Order of Kim Il Sung for her feats for the Party and the revolution.
					
					 Her obituary was issued Friday in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK-Russia governmental Committee
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK-Russia governmental Committee
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Talks between Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, chairman of the DPRK side of the DPRK-Russia Intergovernmental Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee, and Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin, chairman of the Russian side of the committee, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were officials concerned and from the opposite side were members of the Russian delegation and the Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting trade, economic, scientific and technological cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: Kanggye and Chongjin Martyrs Cemeteries Completed
articles.content:
Kanggye and Chongjin Martyrs Cemeteries Completed
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Kanggye Martyrs Cemetery and the Chongjin Martyrs Cemetery were built.
					 Buried at the cemeteries were remains of martyrs and persons of merits who glorified their lives in the sacred struggle for the liberation of the country and its prosperity and reunification remaining faithful to the leadership of the party and the leader.
					
					 Among them are anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs, anti-Japanese patriotic martyrs, heroes of the DPRK and labor heroes.
					
					 Completion ceremonies took place Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations, bereaved families and other working people.
					
					 The participants laid wreaths and bunches of flowers before the cemeteries and observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 Addresses on completion were made by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK.
					
					 At the end of the ceremonies the participants went round the cemeteries.

articles.title: Japanese PM's Statement Dismissed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Japanese PM's Statement Dismissed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea denounced the Japanese prime minister for announcing his hypocritical statement on Aug. 10.
					 The organization in its statement said that the Japanese prime minister issued the statement of apology for Japan's past colonial domination over Korea on the occasion of the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					
					 His statement is void of any solution to the issue of reparation for the damage caused to the Koreans, the organization said.
					
					 Condemning the prime minister for his base act of issuing the statement of no progress while turning down the demand of the international community including the UN, the statement urged the Japanese government to take immediate administrative and legal measures for the settlement of the issue of the victims to Japan's colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities are truly willing to make apology, they should make reparation for the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, the victims of the compulsory military service and the forced labor and the Koreans in Japan suffering from discrimination and suppression by the Japanese authorities, deprived of even elementary rights, it noted.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should refrain from claiming "dominium over Tok Islets" and making any absurd remarks about the victims but opt for properly settling the past, it concluded.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Christian organizations in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on August 12 to demand the puppet authorities opt for achieving peace of the Korean Peninsula and improving the inter-Korean relations, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The organizations deplored that since the Lee Myung Bak regime came to power the south-north relations went off the rails and a check-bar was dropped in the way of the country's reunification. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should stop at once the joint military exercises with the U.S. and resume the non-governmental exchanges between the south and the north, they urged.
					
					 Noting that Rev. Han Sang Ryol visited the north for the improved south-north relations as a peace-loving religionist, they demanded the authorities immediately stop threatening that they would take a legal action against him.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Backtrack from Discrimination Policy
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Backtrack from Discrimination Policy
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The "National Society for Exchanges Desirous of Peace and Democracy", an organization for exchanges among trade union members and activists across Japan, held its 40th conference in Osaka on July 31 and August 1 and demanded the Japanese authorities withdraw their policy of discrimination against the Korean schools in Japan.
					 A special resolution was adopted at the conference. 
					
					 Unpardonable is the Japanese authorities' violation of human rights, the rights of Korean schoolchildren to learn to be specific, it said.
					
					 It urged the governor of Osaka Prefecture to retract his remarks inciting discrimination against the Korean schools and national chauvinism and immediately pay aid funds to Korean schools in the prefecture. It also urged the Japanese authorities to include Korean schools in the tuition-waiver program.
					
					 It called upon Koreans in Japan and the Japanese people to render active cooperation and make efforts to ensure equal opportunity of education for the students of the Korean schools.

articles.title: US Hostile Policy towards DPRK Denounced in Canada
articles.content:
US Hostile Policy towards DPRK Denounced in Canada
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- An open meeting denouncing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK was held in Canada on July 25 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 Present there were personages of political parties and organizations including the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), the Canadian Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other people.
					
					 A spokesman for the above-said party in his speech noted that the U.S., which ignited the Korean War of aggression on June 25, 1950, is still trying hard to cover up its true colors as provoker of the war. This is aimed at justifying new invasion and war to be launched by it against the DPRK, he said.
					
					 He denounced the U.S. for getting frantic in its smear campaign against the DPRK while deliberately linking the DPRK to the case of sunken warship "Cheonan", its own fabrication. He called upon the Canadians to heighten vigilance against the deceptive propaganda of the imperialists to justify aggression and war.
					
					 The chairman of the Canadian Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in his speech cited detailed facts to prove the absurdity of the assertion of the south Korean puppet forces that the "Cheonan" was sunken by the DPRK.
					
					 Then questions and answers followed.
					
					 A decision adopted at the meeting urged the U.S. to respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty, put an end to the Korean War, stop all kinds of military exercises on the Korean Peninsula and immediately withdraw armed forces for aggression from south Korea.
					
					 It stressed the need for the Canadian government to make contributions to peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and make efforts for development of the relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, made public a statement Friday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has firmly safeguarded the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia with his Songun leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il increased the military and technical might of the Korean People's Army in every way through his ceaseless field guidance to units of the KPA and put forward the economic construction line of the Songun era on giving priority to the growth of the national defence industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture, the statement noted.
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK turned into an impregnable fortress, it said, adding that the imperialists do not dare ignite a new war in fear of the strong military might of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement fully supported the DPRK people in their struggle to accomplish the country's reunification independently and peacefully. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Medvedev
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, D. A. Medvedev, con motivo del 65o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea.
					El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 65o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, hago llegar mi saludo al pueblo ruso y deseo que las relaciones de amistad entre la RPDC y la FR se desarrollen segun el espiritu de los documentos comunes aprobados entre ambas partes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Medvedev
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, D. Medvedev.
					El mensaje sigue abajo:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il,
					
					Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, fiesta nacional del pueblo coreano, envio a Usted mis felicitaciones.
					
					Estoy convencido de que se garantizaran mas la seguridad y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y toda la region del Nordeste Asiatico al desarrollarse las relaciones de amistad y respeto mutuo entre los pueblos de los dos paises, formadas y consolidadas historicamente en el proceso de la larga lucha conjunta por liberar a Corea del coloniaje de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il,
					
					Deseo que Usted tenga exitos y felicidad y que el pueblo de la RPDC alcance la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					 Con alta consideracion.
